data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 4,165 believers in Durazno against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Durazno, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Durazno, Uruguay. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, give the disciples of the the state of Durazno an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Durazno, Uruguay find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of La Paloma
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of La Paloma, Durazno, Uruguay.
Spirit, help every believer in Durazno, Uruguay be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Durazno, Uruguay, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary:
the state of Durazno, Uruguay has a population of 57,100.

We estimate Durazno has 4,165 people who might know Jesus, 33,821 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,114 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Durazno to agree with you and with one another.
